name: Plants
description: Unwind and de-stress with the help of the calm music and serene environment. Plants is a nontraditional and nonviolent experience where you take control over a growing flower.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @2.00GHz or AMD equivilent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB video memory Storage: 180 MB available space
